course_description: This course introduces students to laboratory, hemodynamic and diagnostic modalities used in physiological monitoring of critically ill patients. Case studies will be used to apply knowledge of monitoring modalities for clinical decision making.
sections: Class Nbr: 5251, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2:30-4:20p; T 2:30-3:20p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
